events.message: I received my order yesterday but unfortunately I want to return it and get a refund because the size is completely wrong.
The issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to customer request for a return and refund.
The customer support agent John has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned item.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return the item and get a refund. Let me assist you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the item is unopened and in original packaging for the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The item is unopened and still in the original packaging as you requested.
Thank you for the information. We will send you a prepaid return label by email shortly. Once we receive the item, we will process your refund within 5 business days.
That sounds perfect, thank you for the quick help. I will send the package back as soon as I get the label.
The return label has been emailed and the case is now resolved pending receipt of the item for refund processing.
We are checking in to confirm whether you have successfully sent the return package and if you require further assistance.
Yes, I dropped the package off at the post office yesterday. Please let me know when the refund is processed.
Your refund was processed today. You should see the amount credited back to your account within 3-5 business days.
We have sent you a short survey to understand your satisfaction with the refund experience. We appreciate your feedback.
I completed the survey and I am very satisfied with how smoothly everything was handled. Thanks for your help!
This case is now closed following successful refund and positive customer feedback.
